array.string: Hey there, little buddy! My name is Paul the Whale, I'll be your teacher while you're visiting us under the ocean.
If you look down there, you'll see my friends, the Crazy Clams, they make music when you touch them. Why don't you give it a try? Just tap any of them with your finger. Go ahead!
Now that you got the hang of it, we're going to play a little game to make some more music.
I'm going to blow a bubble, and you'll see one of my clam friends open his mouth to sing.
After we're done, then it's your turn to play the same note! OK, are you ready yet? You can tell me you're ready by poking me, but not too hard!
Oh that's not right. Remember, you have to play the same note that we play. Why don't you try again?
Looks like you still haven't got it. I'm going to show you the note again. Don't forget it!
Good job! You're getting the hang of it. Let's keep going!
Hello, I'm Paul the Whale. You have to help me! I don't know where my voice went. No, not this voice, my SINGING voice.
I got up today, and I can't sing anymore. I called my friends, the Clams, over to help, but they don't know my songs. Maybe you can help. I don't know if you're ready for this yet...
Well, maybe you are, little buddy. But you can't let me down! I'm going to blow all the notes out, and you have to follow along. If I blow a red bubble, you have to play the red clam.
Don't fall behind. If you can't let any of my bubbles float away, we have to start over again, otherwise everybody will think I'm a bad singer.
Hello, I'm Paul the Whale. You have to help me! I don't know where my voice went. No, not this voice, my SINGING voice.
I got up today, and I can't sing anymore. I called my friends, the Clams, over to help, but they don't know my songs. Maybe you can help. I don't know if you're ready for this yet...
Well, maybe you are, little buddy. But you can't let me down! I'm going to blow all the notes out, and you have to follow along. If I blow a red bubble, you have to play the red clam.
Don't fall behind. If you can't let any of my bubbles float away, we have to start over again, otherwise everybody will think I'm a bad singer.
That was a good try, but you'll have to be faster than that!
